metadata.title: CVE-2022-36318 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When visiting directory listings for `chrome://` URLs as source text, someparameters were reflected. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.1,Firefox ESR < 91.12, Firefox < 103, Thunderbird < 102.1, and Thunderbird <91.12.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
